I am a Lecturer in Computer Science with a Master’s degree in Computer Science from Pakistan and a passionate data enthusiast. You can reach me via [GitHub](https://github.com/umaira2022) or by email at [umaira.nazar09@gmail.com](mailto:umaira.nazar09@gmail.com).

This project examines how broadband access across U.S. counties relates to income,age, race, and education levels using census data and statistical modeling. The full project is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/umaira2022/Digital-Inequality-in-U.S.-Counties).

This project was created as a part of [Kane’s Data Science Bootcamp](https://bootcamp.davidkane.info/).Special thanks go to the Preceptor for his invaluable guidance and for making this free Data Science training possible.
